source.description: The source from which this channel is being published. It can be a vehicle or server id. The same sort of source should all publish the same set of channels.

channel.description: The channel to which the data is being published to.

callback.description: The callback url for actions that are accepted on this channel

event.description: the name of the event that caused the call to publish

data.description: the state of the channel. all fields must be sent at all times. It's a Map<String, String>

actions.description: the actions that are valid to be called at this state. You can expect the UI to change according to what actions are available
